snippet: A reader explains why Facebook’s strategy will succeed.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Facebook Adds Feature for Organ Donor Status'' (Business Day, May 2): Facebook has taken a major step in using social media to ignite social conscience, which could help save many lives in the immediate future. In fact, Facebook is an ideal tool for the promotion of donor registration, because it rapidly spreads information to a large demographic and exerts persuasive power over its users.
